title: "Russula & Petuum to Bring Industrial AI Software to Steel Industry"
excerpt: "Petuum and Russula are set to integrate Petuum’s award-winning Optimum AI software platform with Russula’s established Rolling Mill Control to enable steel AI for greater product throughput to tackle increased demand while reducing carbon emissions through better energy utilization."
